alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Madison; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 7:40PM CDT until March 26 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Central Franklin Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 740 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Winnsboro, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Crowville around 750 PM CDT. Newlight around 800 PM CDT. Somerset around 815 PM CDT. Afton around 820 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gilbert and Richmond. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana...and west central Mississippi. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
